summary: A young father and his two children struggle to find harmony after his wife leaves them for another man.
cast: Alessandro Morace|Kim Rossi Stuart|Barbora Bobulova|Marta Nobili|Pietro De Silva|Roberta Paladini|Sebastiano Tiraboschi|Francesco Benedetto|Roberta Lena|Sebastiano Busiri Vici|Marco Bardi|Greta Alice Gorietti|Francesca Strati|Federico Santolini|Manuela Occhiuzzi|Maurizio Paradisi|Matilde Amaranto|Luciano Romanelli|Liliana Ottavi|Marcello Piergentili|Alberto Mangiante|Ettore Belmondo|Lidia Vitale|Tommaso Ragno|Anna Ferruzzo|Massimo Vincenti|Matteo Benavides|Alice Bernardini|Kaci Besmir|Bruno Claudio|Alessandra Colasuonno|Chiara Cucca|Gioia De Gennaro|Emiliano da Torre|Gabriele Magi|Marco Pallotti|Erika Passa|Daniele Salvano|Michael Savioli|Giacomo Sy|Carolina Verni|Loretta Rossi Stuart
title: Líbero - Los padres no siempre aciertan
